description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the denial of service vulnerability in Windows Hyper-V (CVE-2024-43633):

1. Download and apply the relevant updates for your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2, use KB5046617.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, use KB5046633.
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, use KB5046633.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- These updates address sensitive data storage issues present in improperly locked memory, which could lead to denial of service.
- Ensure that your system is running one of the affected Windows versions to properly apply the fix.
- The update packages can be found at:
   - [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
   - [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that you are using a compatible build of Windows 11.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
